MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.39am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a broken piece of equipment on the overhead line located near to Brunt Farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.15am on Thursday 4th of February 2021
